=== About Me ===

I am a French guy who works as a system administrator in a small software editor near <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toulouse|Toulouse]]</nowiki>. I am a Ubuntu user since Hoary and start contributing during Dapper cycle.

* '''homepage''' : http://www.porcheron.info
* '''launchpad page''' : https://launchpad.net/~lionel.porcheron
* '''email''' :  * '''jabber''' : lionelporcheron@jabber.org
* '''irc''' : lionel on irc.freenode.net / lionel on irc.rezosup.org / lionel on irc.oftc.net

=== Ubuntu ===

==== Packaging ====

I have made packages for Ubuntu, to be included in the universe repository as part of Ubuntu:

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gastman|gastman]]</nowiki>: gtk console for Asterisk
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/nagcon|nagcon]]</nowiki>: console software for nagios
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox-launchpad-plugin|firefox-launchpad-plugin]]</nowiki>: quick search for Launchpad in Firefox
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/rrdweather|rrdweather]]</nowiki>: display rrd graph of weather

I also work on on bug fixing, sync/merges in Universe: https://launchpad.net/~lionel.porcheron/+packages

==== Translations ====

I am one of the active French translators (and coordinator of the team) of the Ubuntu Weekly News (see the team on Launchpad: https://launchpad.net/~lhu) and more occasional translator on Rosetta.
French translation of the Ubuntu Weekly News can be found there: http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/lettre/
